resources.string: Customize your training routines to achieve your goals! Choose between Powerlifting or Hypertrophy. Save your sessions with all the necessary details for a complete tracking of your progress!
Unleash your potential in endurance! Whether running, swimming, or more! Track your sessions with everything you need to reach your goals.
Intensify your training with HIIT! Record your times for each exercise and follow the sequence for optimal results. Boost your performance like never before!

Maximize your muscle growth with our advanced hypertrophy system! Record every detail: sets, types of sets (normal, drop-sets, supersets, and clusters), repetitions, and key dates such as training day, start date, and end date. Build your path to a stronger and more defined body!

Master the art of powerlifting with our comprehensive tool! Organize your sessions with main and accessory exercises. Additionally, calculate your one-rep max (1RM) to optimize your progress. Get ready to surpass your limits and reach new heights of strength!
